titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

action.text: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Gregg. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 30, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Authorizes expenditures by the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions for the 108th Congress.
